name: django-datafreezer
description: A tool for quickly and easily sharing datasets.

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py collectstatic

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

DATABASE_URL.description: A connection string to your database (PostgreSQL and MySQL are the currently-supported backends).

DATAFREEZER_DESKS_LIST_URL.description: A link to a JSON-formatted list of desks (topic groups) to use in the app.

DATAFREEZER_STAFF_LIST_URL.description: A link to a JSON-formatted list of staffers to use in the app.
